name: Gunmancer (itch)
description:
Gunmancer is a science fantasy roguelike top-down shooter. Summon guns as you shoot your way through mysterious randomly generated dungeons full of ancient forbidden magic of guns and dangerous monsters.

Key Features

  • Action combat - quick-paced reflex heavy shooting and dodging
  • Bosses - defeat the terrifying boss at end of each dungeon
  • Progression - become the most powerful gunmancer that ever lived
    as you find more and more destructive secrets of gun magic
  • Randomly generated dungeons - a huge variety of rooms and enemies
  • Create your weaponry out of thin air
  • Place down floating magic guns that shoot when you do
  • Take the shooting to next level as you shoot through every enemy in the room with half a dozen guns at once
